description: Cholelithiasis is the presence of gallstones in the gallbladder or bile ducts.

attributes.name: Presence
attributes.description: Indicates the presence or absence of cholelithiasis.

attributes.name: Number of stones
attributes.description: Indicates the number of stones present.

values.name: Multiple
values.description: More than one stone is present.

attributes.name: Stone size
attributes.description: Indicates the size of the stones.

attributes.name: Location
attributes.description: Indicates the location of the stones.

values.name: Gallbladder lumen
values.description: The stones are located in the gallbladder lumen.

values.name: Bile ducts
values.description: The stones are located in the bile ducts.

attributes.name: Gallbladder wall thickening
attributes.description: Indicates the presence or absence of gallbladder wall thickening.

attributes.name: Pericholecystic fluid
attributes.description: Indicates the presence or absence of pericholecystic fluid.

attributes.name: Biliary dilatation
attributes.description: Indicates the presence or absence of biliary dilatation.

attributes.name: Signs of acute cholecystitis
attributes.description: Indicates the presence or absence of signs of acute cholecystitis.

values.name: Yes
values.description: Signs of acute cholecystitis are present.

values.name: No
